sentences.sContent: She says Russians have a lot of experience with dairy cows in barns, but not with beef cattle on open rangeland.
sentences.sContent_eng: She says Russians have a lot of experience with dairy cows in barns, but not with beef cattle on open rangeland.
sentences.sCn: 她说俄罗斯对牲口棚中养殖奶牛很有经验，但对户外牧场养殖肉牛没有太多经验。

sentences.sContent: If livestock mimick the grazing behavior of wild herbivores - bunched together for safety, intensely grazing an area for a brief period, and then moving on - rangeland health will improve.
sentences.sContent_eng: If livestock mimick the grazing behavior of wild herbivores - bunched together for safety, intensely grazing an area for a brief period, and then moving on - rangeland health will improve.
sentences.sCn: 如果牲畜们模仿野生食草动物的进食行为，为了保持安全聚集起来觅食，短时间内集中在一个区域内觅食后转移，牧场的健康情况自然会改进。 。

sentences.sContent: Because of overgrazing and other factors, Aconitum leucostomum Worosch, which is rangeland poison plants spreading in Yili river valley, has seriously affected the development of animal husbandry.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because of overgrazing and other factors, Aconitum leucostomum Worosch, which is rangeland poison plants spreading in Yili river valley, has seriously affected the development of animal husbandry.
sentences.sCn: 由于超载、过牧等原因，造成草地毒草-白喉乌头的蔓延，严重地影响了伊犁河谷草地畜牧业的发展。

remMethod.val: range(漫游) + land(土地) → 牛羊可以漫游的土地 → 牧场

trans.tranOther: land that naturally produces forage plants suitable for grazing but where rainfall is too low or erratic for growing crops
